Title: Object: Papyrus Chester Beatty 7
Description: Papyrus Chester Beatty VII; sheet 2(thirteen fragments); Hieratic magical/medical text verso and recto; black line vignettes verso. Recto 2-3, Verso 7-8. Recto: Spells for Protection Against Scorpions Verso: Continuation of Spells Against Scorpions; Others Against Fever, etc.
Curator's comments: Published: Gardiner, Hieratic Papyri, Vol. 1, p.55-65, Vol.2, Plates 33 & 33A, Recto 2-3; Plates 38 & 38A, Verso 7-8. Roccati, RdE 24, p. 155-158 [verso 1-2]. Posener, RdE 33, p. 139 [verso 7,6]. Bardinet, RdE 39, p. 12-13 [verso 1, 4].
See J. Quack, 'Beitraege zu einigen religioesen und magischen Texte', in M. Collier and S. Snape (ed.), Ramesside Studies in Honour of K. A. Kitchen (Bolton 2011), 415 [on vso 8.1].
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (381086) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/381086)
Condition: Papyrus Survey: Condition Details: Papyrus: bloom, fragmentary, fractured, loss Black ink Red ink Tabbed: silk Mount Details: Sandwich: glass Binding: leather Object Priority: B Mount Priority: A Overall Condition: B Curatorial condition comment: incomplete/fragmentary
Acquisition name: Donated by: Sir Alfred Chester Beatty
Donated by: Lady Edith Chester Beatty
